headline: IEX Q1 Earnings Call: IDEX Outpaces Expectations, Navigates Tariff Pressures and Margin Headwinds
summary: Manufacturing company IDEX (NYSE:IEX) reported Q1 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 1.7% year on year to $814.3 million. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.75 per share was 6.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
